results.title: Angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor attenuates pancreatic inflammation and fibrosis in male Wistar Bonn/Kobori rats.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ alleviated @<m>DISEASE_Pancreatitis_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D050500 @@@chronic pancreatitis@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in male WBN/Kob @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.
